bibl.title: A Note on the Pseudepigraphal Allusion in Oxyrhynchus Papyrus No. 4365.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXIII, 4365 contains the earliest surviving Greek manuscript reference to the pseudepigraphal Book of Jubilees (≤ leptØ G°nesiw, the 'detailed' Genesis). [See already: Dieter HAGEDORN, Die "Kleine Genesis" in P. Oxy. LXIII 4365, ZPE 116 (1997) pp. 147-148.] <he lepte Genesis>
FRANKLIN Simon, A Note on the Pseudepigraphal Allusion in Oxyrhynchus Papyrus No. 4365.
